writable.classComment: This class is a request made from the master OrbTracker to a slave OrbTracker to apply Partitions to a Job

field.name: reservedPartitions
field.fieldComment: the number of reserved partitions requested

field.name: activePartitions
field.fieldComment: the number of partitions requested to become active

field.name: jobID
field.fieldComment: the jobID the partitions are requested for

field.name: basePartitionID
field.fieldComment: the base ID used by partition manager to launch partitions
